thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand | smartbuyglasses.co.nz
thread.title: Winston
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses New Zealand reviewed by Winston

author: Winston
title: Winston
text:
I ordered a pair of prescription glasses. This is my second time round. I found the whole experience very easy, and received the glasses within a week of order. Couldn't have asked for more.
The price is excellent for what you get.
Only improvement needed, was trying to find how to properly measure the dimensions of my current glasses with the the suggested dimensions of the new glasses. Could find anything in the knowledge base on it had had to google it up.
